alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 11 at 4:06AM EST until March 11 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. For the Coastal Flood Watch, up to one foot of inundation above ground level possible in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 6 AM EST early this morning, especially around the time of high tide. For the Coastal Flood Watch, from Sunday afternoon through Monday evening, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.5 feet, water covers roads on Saint George Island, is in yards, and is approaching structures. To the east, inundation is occurring at multiple marinas off St. Mary`s River, Smith Creek, and Jutland Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two and a half to three feet above normal. The next high tide at Piney Point is at 4:21 AM and 4:52 PM. The next high tide at Coltons Point is at 4:57 AM and 5:28 PM. The next high tide at Point Lookout is at 3:51 PM and 5:20 AM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. St Marys River at Straits Point MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 11/03 PM 2.0 0.4 0.9 1.0 None 12/06 AM 2.8 1.2 1.2 0.5 None 12/06 PM 3.6 2.0 2.3 1.0 Moderate 13/06 AM 3.9 2.3 2.4 1.0 Moderate 13/06 PM 3.8 2.2 2.6 1.0 Moderate &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
